name: Veronica
subtitle: The Eye of Discernment
description: She is the genius from the Tower of Sage who reestablished the formula for Rune Magic. Currently, she is Orvel's financier and the Chief Guild Officer that directs all guilds. Her strong analytical skills and Rune Magic can shackle her enemies.
story: A genius scholar from the Tower of Sage who remembers everything she sees. After developing her own theories and systems of Rune Magic, she quickly grew bored and moved onto a different subject. Soon, she was appointed as the highest ranking royal secretary of finance. Unfortunately, many politicians refused to accept a commoner as their superior. After many lies and ill rumors, Veronica eventually decided to leave the palace on her own. But this was hardly a defeat for her, and she soon set out to conquer a new path. She headed to the Orvel Guild Alliance, where she would be measured only by her abilities and nothing else. As expected, her incredible perception and analytical skills made her an indispensable asset to numerous guilds.
like: Smart people, fast results, clean documents

inn.idle: Hmm, it's been a while since I just sat back and relaxed.

affinity.greet: I hope you will continue to take care of the evil beasts that continue to attack Orvel.
talk: Rune magic? Hmm, I've learned some at the Tower of Sages. I do also know some Ancient Runes...
Guild management isn't easy. There are way too many guilds...
affinity.gift: Oh, you didn't need to...haah. Well, I thankfully accept.

relationship.greet: I haven't been here in a while...it feels close, and yet so far.
talk: How are your guild activities going? I will help the best I can.
I do want to help more, but it isn't easy. I will try harder.
Fufu, I wonder if I can help you on your next raid.

uw.story: Her approval is needed to process any important items in the Guild Alliance. An office item cherished by the founder of the Guild Alliance. A feather pen and folder put together in a set. The pen has a mana ball embedded in it so it requires mana instead of ink, and it must be used on a magic parchment that cannot be written on with a regular pen. The letters that are written by the writer cannot be erased without the writer's mana. Also, text can be written on the magic parchment without any limit, and it has a function to search for stuff one has written before. It makes Veronica's work that much more effective. Of course, it's useful when it's used for work, but outside of work...
